## Quarto

# Basic Heading for Quarto
*Using italic here* and ~~this is using strikethrough~~
```{python}
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| fig-cap: "Sine function"
#| label: fig-sine

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x= np.linspace(0,10,100)
y= np.sin(x)

plt.plot(x,y)
plt.title("Sine function")
plt.show()

```
